author: Tom Williams
title: K.T. McFarland asks Trump to withdraw her nomination as US envoy
text:
K.T. McFarland asks Trump to withdraw her nomination as US envoy to Singapore Published 23 Mins Ago Tom Williams | CQ Roll Call | Getty Images K.T. McFarland, nominee to be ambassador to Singapore. 
K.T. McFarland, picked by President Donald Trump as his nominee to be U.S. ambassador to Singapore, asked him on Friday to withdraw the nomination. 
"I am asking that you withdraw my nomination to be the U.S. Ambassador to Singapore," McFarland said in a letter sent to the president, a copy of which was seen by Reuters. I have come to this decision reluctantly, because I believe in your mission."
